💻 Opilot is your trusted AI assistant, providing support for many tasks: private brainstorming, summarization of confidential documents, replying to emails, and more. 

🔒 Principal Features:

👉Chat with AI 
✔️Multiple LLM chatbots: chose between LLama, Mistral, Qwen, and more, all in one spot 
✔️Prompt Library: access pre-set prompts by right-clicking anywhere on the page, or from the chat

👉Secure Data Protection  
✔️Local Storage: keep all your information on your device, with no risk of server hacks or data breaches. 
✔️Offline Mode: work with confidence, even without an internet connection.

👉Seamless Integration  
✔️Web App Compatibility: integrate Opilot with your favorite web apps and services.  
✔️Opilot seamlessly integrates with a wide range of popular email clients, collaboration tools, social media platforms, customer relationship management systems, project management tools, accounting software, and development platforms, to name a few.

👉Browser Compatibility  
✔️Chrome, Edge, and Brave: choose your preferred browser without compromising on security.

💻 How to use:  
🔸Click the "Add to Chrome" button and pin it to your toolbar. 
🔸Log into your account. 
🔸Select a text and right-click to access the Opilot AI Tools
🔸Get started with AI!

❓ Frequently Asked Questions:

📌 Is a ChatGPT/OpenAI account required? 
- No, there is no need to have a ChatGPT account to utilize this plugin.

📌 ChatGPT is prohibited in my country. Is it operational where I am? 
- Yes. Our extension is operational across all countries.

📌 How does Opilot protect my data?
- Opilot stores all information locally on your device, ensuring your data is for your eyes only and safe from server hacks and breaches.

📌 Can I use Opilot offline?
- Yes, Opilot can be used offline, giving you peace of mind when working with confidential information.

📪 Contact us:  
Any questions or suggestions? Please get in touch with us at contact@opilot.ai.

Try Opilot today and discover a secure way to work with confidence!
